title: DropHeaders Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for DropHeaders transformation. Drops specified headers from records.

headers.description: Comma-separated list of header names to drop from records.
headers.title: headers

defaultSnippets.label: DropHeaders - Drop specific headers
defaultSnippets.description: Remove specified headers from records. Replace header names with the headers you want to drop.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**DropHeaders** - Remove specified headers from records.

Replace header names with the headers you want to drop.

**Use case:** Clean up headers before sending to systems that don't need them, or remove temporary headers added during processing.

defaultSnippets.label: DropHeaders - Drop sensitive headers
defaultSnippets.description: Remove sensitive headers like authentication tokens. Replace with your actual sensitive header names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**DropHeaders** - Remove sensitive headers like authentication tokens.

Replace with your actual sensitive header names.

**Use case:** Security - remove authentication tokens, API keys, or other sensitive data from headers before forwarding to external systems or logging.
